TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 表示階層式資料繫結控制項 (例如 ) 可以繫結至的階層式資料來源。

span.span: Represents a hierarchical data source that hierarchical data-bound controls such as can bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料並以一致的方式呈現資料控制項資料繫結架構。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項稱為資料繫結控制項，並輔助繫結的類別則稱為資料來源控制項。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以代表任何資料來源： 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項是衍生自類別，這是基底的 ASP.NET 實作的介面。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, which is the base ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 介面是用來定義資料來源控制項公開階層式資料，而不是表格式或清單樣式的資料，到 Web 伺服器控制項是衍生自類別，例如控制項。The interface is used to define data source controls that expose hierarchical data, rather than tabular or list-style data, to Web server controls that derive from the class, such as the control. 介面會定義單一方法，表示擷取強型別物件。The interface defines a single method, , which retrieves a strongly typed object. 實作這個介面的資料來源控制項支援它們所代表的資料的每個階層層級的階層式檢視。Data source controls that implement this interface support a hierarchical view for each hierarchical level of data they represent. 資料來源檢視不名稱，例如物件，但是由其唯一的階層式路徑，也就是識別`viewPath`參數傳遞至方法。The data source views are not named, like objects, but are identified by their unique hierarchical path, which is the `viewPath` parameter passed to the method. 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為物件和其相關聯的檢視，對基礎資料。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data. 每個相關聯物件會定義階層式層級表示，資料來源控制項的功能，並如所有 ASP.NET 資料來源檢視物件，執行作業，例如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序。Each associated object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and, like all ASP.NET data source view objects, performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. 資料來源控制項公開階層式資料，例如，衍生自類別。Data source controls that expose only hierarchical data, such as , are derived from the class. 其他資料來源控制項，將其資料公開為階層式資料和表格式資料，例如，衍生自實作，但和介面。Other data source controls that expose their data as both hierarchical data and tabular data, such as , are derived from but implement the and interfaces. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充抽象類別，它會實作介面，來建立資料來源控制項來顯示檔案系統資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class, which implements the interface, to create a data source control that displays file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`類別會提供實作方法，擷取指定的檔案系統路徑的強型別的檢視物件。The `FileSystemDataSource` class provides an implementation of the method, which retrieves a strongly typed view object for a specified file system path. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當 介面所表示的資料儲存體已變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the data storage that the interface represents has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更資料來源控制項的屬性，例如變更時，會引發事件屬性控制項，或變更基礎資料儲存區，XML 節點變更時所發生這種情況中的資料所執行的編輯動作控制項。The event is raised when a change is made to the data source control's properties, such as changing the property of an control, or changing the data in the underlying data storage, which happens when XML nodes are changed by an edit action performed by an control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView GetHierarchicalView(string viewPath) cil managed
Public Function GetHierarchicalView (viewPath As String) As HierarchicalDataSourceView

param.name: viewPath
param.span: 要擷取之檢視的階層式路徑。

span.span: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.

summary.span: 為指定之路徑的 介面，取得檢視 Helper 物件。

span.span: Gets the view helper object for the interface for the specified path.

returns.span: 傳回 ，表示階層式資料的單一檢視，由 參數識別此資料的階層式層次。

span.span: Returns a that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面，例如介面，用來定義階層式資料來源控制項可用來擷取資料來源檢視的方法。The interface, like the interface, defines a method that hierarchical data source controls use to retrieve a data source view. 如同所有協助程式物件與資料來源控制項相關聯物件會定義資料來源可以執行與基礎資料的作業。Like all helper objects that are associated with data source controls, a object defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data. 不過，雖然通常代表表格式資料的資料來源控制項有只有一個已命名的檢視，階層式資料來源控制項支援檢視資料來源控制項所代表的階層式資料的每個層級。However, although data source controls that represent tabular data typically have only one named view, hierarchical data source controls support a view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 階層式資料的層級由唯一的階層式路徑，傳遞做為`viewPath`參數。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed as the `viewPath` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在該類別可擴充類別來擷取強型別唯一的階層式路徑的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to retrieve a strongly typed object for a unique hierarchical path. `FileSystemDataSource`類別的實作擷取`FileSystemDataSourceView`物件指定的檔案系統路徑。The `FileSystemDataSource` class's implementation of retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object for a specified file system path. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]
